title: Cozy Duplex Retreat in Dyrekcja – Peaceful Family Living Near the Waterfront
description: Nestled in the tranquil Dyrekcja neighborhood of Chelm, this inviting duplex offers spacious living across 143 sqm. With three generous bedrooms and three modern bathrooms, this home blends classic comfort with sustainable features for low-maintenance living. Enjoy rich hardwood floors, solar panels for efficiency, and accessible recycling facilities.
neighborhood_description: Dyrekcja is a quiet, growing neighborhood characterized by its welcoming atmosphere and awareness of eco-friendly living. The area fosters an eco-conscious community, with like-minded neighbors and proximity to Chelm's charming waterfront, perfect for leisurely walks and fresh air. Convenient highway access ensures easy connections for any visitors or day trips alike.
lifestyle_benefits: adaptable ground floor for limited mobility
target_buyer: Ideal for retirees seeking tranquil, eco-friendly living low in distractions and high in neighborhood camaraderie. This home would suit those who value sustainability, walkable amenities, and a peaceful setting near the waterfront.
market_positioning: A stand-out option for retirees or downsizers within Chelm, this duplex uniquely combines environmental responsibility with practical comfort, offering advantages rare to find in this compact, green enclave.
